title: Silver on the Tree
description: This book of fantasy concerns the conflict between good and evil. During the high summer in England, a dreadful warning disrupts Will Stanton's peaceful world--the Dark is rising in it last and greatest bid to control the world. Will and his friends fight fear and death in the darkly brooding Welsh mountains. It is there that Will and Bran are taken to the haunting timeless Lost Land to find the crystal sword that alone can ultimately vanquish the Dark.
author: Susan Cooper
